[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@fgv/ts-sudoku-lib](./ts-sudoku-lib.md) &gt; [Hints](./ts-sudoku-lib.hints.md) &gt; [PuzzleSessionHints](./ts-sudoku-lib.hints.puzzlesessionhints.md)

## Hints.PuzzleSessionHints class

Wrapper class that integrates hint functionality with PuzzleSession. Provides hint generation, application, and explanation capabilities while maintaining integration with existing state management and undo/redo functionality.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class PuzzleSessionHints 
```

## Remarks

The constructor for this class is marked as internal. Third-party code should not call the constructor directly or create subclasses that extend the `PuzzleSessionHints` class.
